title: Decision to hold final in Ahmedabad was based on scientific inputs: BCCI
description: Kolkata was forecast to receive 65 percent rainfall on the day of the final - and the prediction proved spot on.

title: PBKS feel the pinch of Salt
description: The Englishman held on to a clutch boundary-line catch to send Prabhsimran Singh on his way back early in Punjabâ€™s chase of 191.

title: The final is about the emotion and the fire in the tank to win: Dinesh Karthik
description: Catch the reactions from the RCB players after their first IPL win.

title: I never thought this day would come... I'm going to sleep like a baby: Kohli
description: Virat Kohli and RCB ended a 17 year wait to get their hands on the coveted IPL trophy.

title: RCB end 17-year-long wait to win maiden IPL title
description: Krunal Pandya's incredible spell through the middle-overs set RCB up as PBKS fell short in chase.
